🔦 Bring a flashlight
🍬 Inspect your candy
🐶 Keep pets safely indoors

 https://bit.ly/2N2sd9g
From my family to yours, #HappyHalloween! 👻🕷️💀 pic.twitter.com/qRubSVLGKc

Today's vote lays the foundation for the next phase of the #impeachment inquiry into the President's conduct. The American people will be able to hear the testimony and evidence in open/public hearings. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1189928198101970944 …
Thank you, Secretary @JohnKerry. And thank you for your continued support for our #diplomats and @StateDept officials. https://twitter.com/JohnKerry/status/1189643118699843585 …
Great to meet with Gen. George Casey Jr. (Ret.), who served our nation as 36th Chief of Staff of the @USArmy. pic.twitter.com/n0G5XXApg1
Honored to support @the_USO and make care packages for our troops. Our service members deserve our unwavering support. 🇺🇸 pic.twitter.com/HkVBXeyP8h
We must send a strong signal to our #diplomats that they are valued, and that starts with retaining and promoting our best and brightest public servants. The #STANDAct does just that.

Career #diplomats dedicate their lives to serving the American people and government both home and abroad.

They serve on the front lines of American #diplomacy, helping mitigate and prevent some of our country’s most pressing #foreignpolicy issues.

At the same time, I have been deeply troubled by reports of the Trump Administration sidelining @StateDept policy experts on critical national security issues and retaliating against career employees. https://politi.co/2N2rBAp

During a time of increasing complex global challenges and #NationalSecurity threats facing the US, we must have our most qualified and experienced public servants representing the United States around the world. #STANDACT

Under this Administration, a record # of Ambassador positions have been filled by political appointees. While it’s true that some have a wealth of professional experience that contributes to our nation, many individuals have little to no prior diplomatic experience. #STANDAct

Today, I'm releasing the #STANDAct, which would strengthen @StateDept #diplomacy by requiring at least 70% of Ambassador appointments be career State Department officials. https://bera.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/rep-bera-releases-legislation-to-strengthen-state-department-diplomacy …

This is inexcusable. 

The Trump Administration's assault on the #AffordableCareAct and its cutting of #Medicaid is having real world consequences for working families, including our nation's children. #ProtectOurCare https://cnn.it/36hL1J9

I just voted to help pass the bipartisan #PACTAct, which imposes strong sanctions against #Turkey until it withdraws from northern Syria. We must hold Turkey accountable for its horrific crimes committed against our allies the Kurds. https://bit.ly/2JvLlKo

It's reprehensible for anyone to try to smear the character and record of Lt. Col. Vindman. He is a patriot, Purple Heart recipient, and serves our country with honor and integrity. pic.twitter.com/EpxdUjO886

My heart goes out to everyone who has been impacted by the fires raging in #California. If you or someone you know needs help, click here to learn about resources that may be available — including air quality information:  https://bera.house.gov/wildfires  https://twitter.com/sacbee_news/status/1188660311013785600 …
Wishing a safe, happy, and healthy #Diwali to those celebrating in Sacramento, across the country, and around the world. pic.twitter.com/sZ8zAwX9wH
I wish my Republican colleagues wouldn't turn this process into a circus. Watch my full interview with @cheddar on #impeachment. 👀👇 https://bit.ly/2pdlgJj

Chatted with @cheddar about the impeachment investigation, including the stunt by Republicans yesterday to block a congressional deposition. 

I’ve sat in on the depositions. Republicans and their staff have participated fully in the process. We must continue to follow the facts. pic.twitter.com/E8n0UY7hFY

In 1988, there were 350,000 annual cases of wild polio in 125 countries. Today, we’ve reduced total cases by 99.9%. We are close, but we can’t stop now. Let’s finish the job! #EndPolio #WorldPolioDay 🌍 pic.twitter.com/ujJlmFSNyl

On #WorldPolioDay, we celebrate US investments to #EndPolio that have built a global infrastructure able to detect diseases & deliver health interventions to children & families.

These investments strengthen countries’ health systems and protect the US & the world from disease. pic.twitter.com/B7SX0EAhrt

Here’s what happens if the Trump Administration succeeds in striking down the #ACA:

🙅🏾‍♀️ Millions of Americans would lose their health insurance
🙅🏽‍♂️ Those with pre-existing conditions would lose coverage
📈 Health care costs would rise https://nyti.ms/2JHBKms

"President Trump’s top Obamacare chief refused to tell Congress yesterday how the administration would replace the landmark 2010 health-care law should a federal appeals court knock it down in the coming weeks." #ACA

The truth is, the Trump Administration has no plan. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1187347776033689601 …
Best of luck to the @SacramentoKings as they kick off their NBA season tonight! #SacramentoProud #GoKings 👑 https://twitter.com/SacramentoKings/status/1187067825556320256 …

The #SHIELDAct would:

✅ Make online ads more transparent
✅ Require campaigns to tell the FBI when foreign govt's try to interfere
✅ Close loopholes allowing foreign spending
✅ Penalize deceptive practices about voting pic.twitter.com/bPc3D1ei0N

We cannot let foreign adversaries continue to manipulate our elections through coordinated disinformation campaigns. We must act!

Proud to be a cosponsor and help pass today the #SHIELDAct, which would make sure the foreign interference we saw in 2016 doesn't happen again. pic.twitter.com/J2inTsuo9E

Great to meet w/ Col. Bruce Pitman, USMC (ret.) of Carmichael, CA and his service dog, Wembley! 🐶

Enjoyed learning about @ccicanine and the important work of their service dogs who assist #veterans with post-traumatic stress disorder. #CA07 pic.twitter.com/7E6NsO4BjT

The first #AllWomanSpacewalk is happening now! Congratulations to @Astro_Christina and @Astro_Jessica  on this historic day for #WomenInSTEM! @NASA https://twitter.com/NASA/status/1185141081702391809 …
We can and must do more to #EndGunViolence.

As a doctor who’s worked with patients impacted by #gunviolence, I strongly believe we should solve this crisis the way we would any other public health emergency - with government, business, the nonprofit sector, and the health care community all working together.

I participated in a roundtable with physicians, public health experts, and Members of Congress where we discussed ways we can better address #gunviolence, especially from a public health perspective. pic.twitter.com/KpgOUOmkdF

Deeply saddened over the passing of @RepCummings. He was a fierce advocate for democracy, justice, and the people of Baltimore. My thoughts and condolences are with his family, friends, and constituents.

I voted today for a bipartisan resolution condemning the President's decision to abruptly withdraw troops from #Syria. 

The President's decision abandons our allies, emboldens our adversaries, and puts our national security at risk. https://twitter.com/nprpolitics/status/1184543456154279937 …

This is welcome news! These resources will help save the lives of countless people across the world. 

I commend the leadership and commitment of the United States in fighting these deadly diseases. https://bit.ly/2MKgTNH
Great to be at the ribbon cutting ceremony for the new @DignityMedGroup medical office building in #CitrusHeights. #CA07 pic.twitter.com/wzhdv35VaC

I joined my colleagues in rejecting the Administration’s politically-motivated attacks on #California under the false pretense of protecting our air and water.

The truth is, #California has led the country on environmental policies. And we'll continue to do so. https://twitter.com/RepMikeLevin/status/1181644677205725184 …

Today's bipartisan report reconfirms that #Russia has and will continue to use social media to sow discord and wage information warfare against the U.S.

We must do more to ensure the security and integrity of our #elections, the bedrock of our #democracy. https://wapo.st/2OC6d62

We cannot abandon our allies. The Kurds have been fighting side by side with us against ISIS. An abrupt withdrawal of troops puts ours allies at a disadvantage, and our national security at risk.

The President's decision risks undoing years of gains against ISIS. https://twitter.com/NewsHour/status/1181246808284188678 …
